title: "How can hypnosis help with sexual dysfunctions, dermatological issues, and eating disorders?"
first_phrase: This text is about the use of hypnosis in various medical conditions such as frigidity, premature ejaculation, impotence, verrucas, herpes zoster, nevrosi, anorexia nervosa, and tinnitus auricular. In the last part of the text, the author explains how hypnosis can be used to treat premature ejaculation. The technique involves relaxation to reduce the anxiety and tension that triggers the condition. The patient is made to feel relaxed and comfortable, and the hypnotist suggests that the patient will sleep better, no longer feel any pain or discomfort, and will feel calm and relaxed going forward. The number of sessions required ranges from four to six.

last_phrase: In conclusion, hypno-dentistry can help individuals overcome anxiety, fear, tension, and even substitute clinical medications. This technique helps reduce pain and makes patients feel relaxed and comfortable during dental procedures. The presence of a partner is essential during inductions, and the number of sessions typically ranges from six to eight. Furthermore, hypnosis can be used for a variety of other medical conditions such as enuresis, speech defects, brain injuries, and even smoking cessation through autohypnosis. By adhering to the three golden rules of hypnotherapy, anyone can use hypnotic techniques safely and effectively on themselves or others.
